org.ensor.math.geometry

Interface IMetric<VectorType>

  • Type Parameters:
    VectorType - The type of value that this metric measures distance for.

    public interface IMetric<VectorType>
    This method implements the concept of a metric.
    Author:
    jona

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(VectorType aOne, VectorType aTwo)
      The distance function inherent in this metric.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        double distance(VectorType aOne,
              VectorType aTwo)
        The distance function inherent in this metric.
        Parameters:
        aOne - The first object to measure distance for.
        aTwo - The second object to measure distance for.
        Returns:
        The distance between the two given objects.
